item.title: Vote4Cash
item.dc:creator: @bobmich bobmich
item.description:
@bobmich wrote:

How do i add a reward as PK points also?
On welcome Message it is

getItems().addItem(995, 15000000); sendMessage("Thanks for voting!"); }
How do i make it so they get PKpoints also?

Read full topic
